name: Haunted Scary School Teacher
description:
As a scary teacher, you are responsible for getting to know your students and be polite with them. Build a good relationship of trust and respect is most important. The crazy scary teacher give physical punishment to the students in the classroom and torture them a lot. The behaviour of the scary teacher is so bad with the students. Because she give the most painful punishment by using lots of scared tricks. One day all students of the school decide to take act of revenge from the scary teacher. They make a plan and go to the home of the crazy teacher and say hello to the scary neighbour teacher.

* Main Features *
• Doing multiple stunning acts with scary teacher
• To do funny tasks with a crazy creepy teacher
• Amazing theme and realistic control
• Multiple stunning tasks to do
• Take revenge from crazy scary teacher when she was alone
